#this is a comment
#test expressions must be in the form:
#@expr
#;bundle
#;answer
#@ <-this signifies the end of a test expression
#place a 
#osc messages must be delimited with a newline or newline character ( \n )
/one = /three - 2
;/three 3
;/three 3
/one 1
;
@
/one = /two * 45
;/two 3
;/two 3
/one 135
;
@
/one = /two * 45
;/two 3
;/two 3
/one 135
;
@
/one = (/two * 45) + /three
;/two 35
/three 124
;/two 35
/three 124
/one 1699
;
@
/one = (/two * 45) + (/three - 581)
;/two 35
/three 124
;/two 35
/three 124
/one 1118
;
@
/one = (++/two * 45) + (/three - 581)
;/two 34
/three 124
;/two 35
/three 124
/one 1118
;
@
/one ++
;/one 34
;/one 35
;
@
++/one
;/one 34
;/one 35
;
@
/one = (/two * 38) + (/three / 5)
;/two -14
/three 125
;/two -14
/three 125
/one -507
;
@
/one = (/two * 38) + (/three / 5)
;/two -14
/three 125
;/two -14
/three 125
/one -507
;
@
if(2 < 3, /one = 1, /one 0)
;/one 3
;/one 1
;
@
